## ThirdwebSDK.getNFTCollection() method

Get an SDK interface for an NFT Collection program

**Signature:**

```typescript
getNFTCollection(address: string): Promise<NFTCollection>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description            |
| --------- | ------ | ---------------------- |
| address   | string | Address of the program |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[NFTCollection](./sdk.nftcollection.md)&gt;

SDK interface for the program
